  </identifier>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205407</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Elevating the Everyday: Garry Knox Bennett</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erhöhen das tägliche: Garry Knox Bennett</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Élévation du journalier : Garry Knox 
Bennett</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Elevating o diário: Garry Knox Bennett</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Elevamento del giornaliere: Garry Knox 
Bennett</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανύψωση τον καθημερινού: Θ*Γαρρυ Knox 
Bennett</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Elevación del diario: Garry Knox Bennett</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Spark visits vanguard furniture maker Garry Knox Bennett at work as he produces the last in a series of fifty chairs for an upcoming exhibition at the Oakland Museum of California. This Educator Guide addresses the history of art furniture.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Funken besucht Avantgardemöbelhersteller Garry 
Knox Bennett an der Arbeit, während er das Letzte in einer Reihe von 
fünfzig Stühlen für eine upcoming Ausstellung am Oakland Museum von
Kalifornien produziert. Diese Erzieher-Anleitung adressiert die 
Geschichte der kunstmöbel.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'étincelle visite le générateur Garry Knox 
Bennett de meubles de tête d'avant-garde au travail pendant qu'il 
produit le bout dans une série de cinquante chaises pour une 
exposition prochaine au musée d'Oakland de la Californie. Ce 
guide d'éducateur adresse l'histoire des meubles d'art.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A faísca visita o fabricante Garry Knox Bennett 
do furniture do vanguard no trabalho enquanto produz o último em uma 
série de cinqüênta cadeiras para um exhibition upcoming no museu de
Oakland de Califórnia. Esta guia do educador dirige-se ao 
history do furniture da arte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La scintilla visita il creatore Garry Knox Bennett
della mobilia di avanguardia sul lavoro mentre produce l'ultimo in 
serie di cinquanta sedie per una mostra imminente al museo de Oakland 
della California. Questa guida dell'educatore richiama la storia
della mobilia di arte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο σπινθήρας επισκέπτεται τον κατασκευαστή Garry 
Knox Bennett επίπλων εμπροσθοφυλακής στην εργασία δεδομένου 
ότι παράγει τον τελευταίο σε μία σειρά πενήντα καρεκλών για μια
επερχόμενη έκθεση στο μουσείο του Όουκλαντ Καλιφόρνιας. 
Αυτός ο οδηγός εκπαιδευτικών εξετάζει την ιστορία των 
επίπλων τέχνης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La chispa visita el fabricante Garry Knox Bennett 
de los muebles de la vanguardia en el trabajo mientras que él produce
el último en una serie de cincuenta sillas para una exposición 
próxima en el museo de Oakland de California. Esta guía del 
educador trata la historia de los muebles del arte.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

        </educational>
        <rights>

            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>

          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>

      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>

  </manifestation>
